name: uebersicht-widget-istats
description: Ãœbersicht widget for the iStats Ruby gem to display SMC information on your desktop.
author: Roland Schaer <roele33@hotmail.com>

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/istats.widget && rsync -r -R index.jsx index.css icons.ttf src/ dist/istats.widget --exclude={'__mocks__','__tests__'}
scripts.zip: cd dist && zip -r istats.widget.zip istats.widget -i@../include.lst -x@../exclude.lst -X && mv istats.widget.zip ..
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean
